message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC 

This paper proposes a novel end-to-end method for generating short email responses using deep learning, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). Therefore, cs.CL is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses challenges related to scalability and response diversity, which are common issues in information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG) systems. Additionally, the system is designed to work on mobile devices, which involves human-computer interaction (HC) considerations. Finally, the paper mentions the use of large-scale deep learning, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (AI) research.
